content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. The monthly rental price is negotiable, but I must say that I am looking for a fair market value. May I ask what your budget is for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros per month. I am a student, so I don't have a lot of money. I want to be able to pay the rent and cover all my expenses. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Of course, Nesibe. The apartment is located in the heart of Manhattan, just a short walk from some of the city's most popular attractions. It has a cozy living room, a small kitchen, and a bedroom with a comfortable bed. The building also has a laundry room on the ground floor, and there is a supermarket just a few blocks away.

In terms of rent, I am willing to be flexible, but I do require a security deposit to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent. The security deposit is usually one month's rent, and it will be returned to you at the end of your tenancy, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the lease agreement.

If you are interested in renting the apartment, I am open to discussing the specifics of the lease agreement with you. What are your thoughts?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month, including utilities. I also agree to pay a security deposit of one month's rent, which is 800 Euros. I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thank you for your help, Mister Heine. I appreciate it.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
You're welcome, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement that works for both of us. Once you sign the lease agreement, you will be able to move in and start enjoying your new home in Manhattan.

If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm always here to help.
name: Heinrich Heine
